name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Laura Ann CAMPANELLA, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Campanella

parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Laura Ann CAMPANELLA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of October, 2001, on certification by the Disciplinary Board that the respondent, LAURA ANN CAMPANELLA, who was suspended by Order of this Court dated April 2, 2001, for a period of ninety-one days, has filed a verified statement showing compliance with all the terms and conditions of the Order of Suspension and Rule 217, Pa. R.D.E., and there being no other outstanding order of suspension or disbarment, LAURA ANN CAMPANELLA, is hereby reinstated to active status, effective immediately.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
786 A.2d 171
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. Laura Ann CAMPANELLA, Respondent.
No. 653 Disciplinary Docket No. 3.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 19, 2001.
